name: AntCC
description: Build with Apache Ant and check CodeCoverage
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: antBuildFile
inputs.label: Ant build file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repository root to the `Ant build file`.

inputs.name: publishJUnitResults
inputs.label: Publish to VSO/TFS
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to publish JUnit Test results produced by the Ant build to VSO/TFS. Each test result file matching `Test Results Files` will be published as a test run in VSO/TFS.

inputs.name: testResultsFiles
inputs.label: Test Results Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test results files path.  Wildcards can be used.  For example, `**/TEST-*.xml` for all xml files whose name starts with TEST-.

inputs.name: codeCoverageTool
inputs.label: CodeCoverage Tool
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the tool for evaluating code coverage. Only Jacoco support available currently. Jacocoant.jar should be present in lib folder of Ant installation.

inputs.name: classfilesDirectory
inputs.label: Classfiles Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression specifying classfiles to be analyzed.

inputs.name: classFilter
inputs.label: Class Inclusion/Exclusion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filter to include or exclude classes for evaluating code coverage.

inputs.name: jdkVersion
inputs.label: JDK Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will attempt to discover the path to the selected JDK version and set JAVA_HOME accordingly.

inputs.name: jdkArchitecture
inputs.label: JDK Architecture
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the architecture (x86, x64) of JDK.
